mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TMG_TRIGGER ( TTR_CCUSTOMERID, TTR_CCOMPANYID, TTR_CEMPLOYEEID, TTR_DSTARTDATE, TTR_DENDDATE, TTR_CMODIFIERUSERID, TTR_DMODIFIEDDATE, TTR_CMODIFIERPROGRAMID, TTR_CPROGRAMID, TTR_CPARAMETER1, TTR_DPARAMETER1 ) SELECT TDA_CCUSTOMERID, TDA_CCOMPANYID, TDA_CEMPLOYEEID, to_date('1900/01/01','yyyy/mm/dd'), to_date('2222/12/31','yyyy/mm/dd'), #{userCode}, SYSDATE, 'TmgResults_' || #{action}, 'TmgResults_' || #{action}, #{action}, TDA_DYYYYMMDD FROM TMG_DAILY WHERE TDA_CCUSTOMERID = #{custID} AND TDA_CCOMPANYID = #{compCode} AND TDA_CEMPLOYEEID = #{targetUser} AND TDA_CSTATUSFLG = 'TMG_DATASTATUS|1' AND TDA_DYYYYMMDD >= #{stDate} AND TDA_DYYYYMMDD <= #{endDate}

INSERT INTO TMG_TRIGGER ( TTR_CCUSTOMERID, TTR_CCOMPANYID, TTR_CEMPLOYEEID, TTR_DSTARTDATE, TTR_DENDDATE, TTR_CMODIFIERUSERID, TTR_DMODIFIEDDATE, TTR_CMODIFIERPROGRAMID, TTR_CPROGRAMID, TTR_CPARAMETER1, TTR_DPARAMETER1 ) VALUES( #{custID}, #{compCode}, #{targetUser}, to_date('1900/01/01','yyyy/mm/dd'), to_date('2222/12/31','yyyy/mm/dd'), #{userCode}, sysdate, 'TmgResults_' || #{txtAction}, 'TmgResults_' || #{txtAction}, #{txtAction}, #{day} )

INSERT INTO TMG_TRIGGER ( TTR_CCUSTOMERID, TTR_CCOMPANYID, TTR_CEMPLOYEEID, TTR_DSTARTDATE, TTR_DENDDATE, TTR_CMODIFIERUSERID, TTR_DMODIFIEDDATE, TTR_CMODIFIERPROGRAMID, TTR_CPROGRAMID, TTR_CPARAMETER1, TTR_DPARAMETER1 ) SELECT TDA_CCUSTOMERID, TDA_CCOMPANYID, TDA_CEMPLOYEEID, TO_DATE('1900/01/01', 'YYYY/MM/DD'), TO_DATE('2222/12/31', 'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{userCode}, SYSDATE, 'PermStatList_' || #{action}, 'PermStatList_' || #{action}, #{action}, TDA_DYYYYMMDD FROM (${empSql}), TMG_DAILY WHERE TDA_CCUSTOMERID = cust AND TDA_CCOMPANYID = comp AND TDA_CEMPLOYEEID = empid AND TDA_CSTATUSFLG = 'TMG_DATASTATUS|1' AND TDA_DYYYYMMDD >= #{stDate} AND TDA_DYYYYMMDD <= #{endDate}

INSERT INTO TMG_TRIGGER SELECT e.cust, e.comp, e.empid, '1900/01/01' , '2222/12/31', #{loginUserCode}, SYSDATE, 'DeptStatList_ACT_Disp_RList', 'DeptStatList_ACT_Disp_RList', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'ACT_Disp_RList', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, d.TDA_DYYYYMMDD, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL FROM TMG_DAILY d, (${empsql}) e, TMG_MONTHLY m WHERE m.TMO_CEMPLOYEEID = e.EMPID AND m.TMO_DYYYYMM = TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{pWorkDate}),'MM') AND m.TMO_CCOMPANYID = e.COMP AND m.TMO_CCUSTOMERID = e.CUST AND d.TDA_CEMPLOYEEID = m.TMO_CEMPLOYEEID AND d.TDA_DYYYYMM = #{baseDate} AND d.TDA_DYYYYMMDD <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND d.TDA_CCUSTOMERID = m.TMO_CCUSTOMERID AND d.TDA_CCOMPANYID = m.TMO_CCOMPANYID AND d.TDA_CSTATUSFLG = 'TMG_DATASTATUS|1'

INSERT INTO TMG_TRIGGER ( TTR_CCUSTOMERID, TTR_CCOMPANYID, TTR_CEMPLOYEEID, TTR_DSTARTDATE, TTR_DENDDATE, TTR_CMODIFIERUSERID, TTR_DMODIFIEDDATE, TTR_CMODIFIERPROGRAMID, TTR_CPROGRAMID, TTR_DPARAMETER1 ) VALUES ( #{custID}, #{compCode}, #{dispUserCode}, TO_DATE('19000101', 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_DATE('22221231', 'YYYYMMDD'), #{userCode}, SYSDATE, 'PaidHoliday_ACT_UADJUST', 'PaidHoliday', ( SELECT MAX(TPH_DYYYYMM) FROM TMG_PAID_HOLIDAY WHERE TPH_CEMPLOYEEID = #{dispUserCode} and TPH_DYYYYMM <= TO_DATE(#{baseDate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd') AND TPH_DYYYYMM <= ( SELECT max(TMG_F_GET_THE_YEARZONE( TMG_F_GET_THE_YEAR(TO_DATE(#{baseDate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd'), #{custID}, #{compCode}) , 1 , TO_DATE(#{baseDate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd') , #{custID} , #{compCode} ) ) FROM DUAL ) AND TPH_CCOMPANYID = #{compCode} ) )

INSERT INTO TMG_TRIGGER ( TTR_CCUSTOMERID, TTR_CCOMPANYID, TTR_CEMPLOYEEID, TTR_DSTARTDATE, TTR_DENDDATE, TTR_CMODIFIERUSERID, TTR_DMODIFIEDDATE, TTR_CMODIFIERPROGRAMID, TTR_CPROGRAMID ) VALUES ( #{custID}, #{compCode} , #{userCode} , TO_DATE('1900/01/01', 'YYYY/MM/DD') , TO_DATE('2222/12/31', 'YYYY/MM/DD') , #{userCode} , TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'DD'), #{programId} , #{programId} )
